content:
# I have successfully crafted 1 iron gear wheel. My updated inventory now reflects:
# - 2 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 5 coal
# - 8 stones
# - 5 copper ore
# - 2 iron gear wheels
# - 2 electronic circuits

# The stone furnace is still idle with 23 units of coal and no ingredients left to smelt.

# With the current inventory, I can now craft an Assembling Machine, which requires:
# - 1 electronic circuit
# - 1 iron gear wheel
# - 1 transport belt

# I have:
# - 2 electronic circuits (sufficient)
# - 2 iron gear wheels (sufficient)
# - 2 transport belts (sufficient)

# I will now proceed to craft the Assembling Machine correctly this time.

craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine, quantity=1)  # Craft 1 Assembling Machine.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after crafting the Assembling Machine. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
